commission.title: Commission Policy
commission.text: Busify collects a 5-10% commission on each ticket sold through the platform. Settlements are made monthly.

termination.title: Contract Termination
termination.text: Either party may terminate the contract with 30 days' notice. In the event of a serious breach, the contract may be terminated immediately.

privacy.title: Data Privacy
privacy.text: Busify is committed to protecting customer information and will not share it with third parties without consent.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.text: Any disputes will be resolved through negotiation. If no agreement is reached, the matter will be brought before a competent court.
